net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db
Class GenericDataHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db.DataHandler
      net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db.GenericDataHandler

public class GenericDataHandler
extends DataHandler

GenericDataHandler is a convenience class that acts as an extension of the Abstract DataHandler class. Use this class if required to instantiate a handler for db operations

Version:
1.1
Author:
George Moraitakis

getDataListFromMap

public DataResults getDataListFromMap(String sql,
                                      Map<String,Object> args)
Get a result set in list form after running a select query. It passes a custom sql query with args as a Map with the default row flag id i.e. "rowX_"

Parameters:
sql - the custom sql query
args - the arguments to pass
Returns:
the list of data

doInsertSql

public void doInsertSql(String sql,
                        Object... args)
It carries out an insertion SQL.

Parameters:
sql - the sql to run. Parameters should be in ?
args - the arguments to pass. They replace the ? of the SQL

doUpdateSql

public void doUpdateSql(String sql,
                        Object... args)
It carries out an update SQL.

Parameters:
sql - the sql to run. Parameters should be in ?
args - the arguments to pass. They replace the ? of the SQL

doUpdate

public void doUpdate(String id,
                     Object... args)
It carries out an update SQL. For convinience you can pass explicitely the id of the row to update

Parameters:
id - the id of the row to update
args - the rest of the arguments to pass. They replace the ? of the SQL

doDeleteSql

public void doDeleteSql(String sql,
                        String id)
It carries out a delete SQL for a specific id

Parameters:
sql - the sql to run
id - the id of the row to delete
